Name: Pepenero
Review Text: My teenage daughter and I dined at Pepenero two nights ago and the experience was fantastic.  Brad, our server, was professional, polite and very helpful navigating the varied food choices.  Once the food arrived, we were amazed by the â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text:
A great experience. This restaurant is on par with any US large city dining experience.
Great everything: appetizers, entrees, desserts, salads, fine wines, etc. Old â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Very nice place for a quiet dinner, service was excellent and food was very good. Everything was served with impeccable timing. Highly recommend the Polpo/Spanish Octopus.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Our dinner at PepeNero was wonderful.  Our server, Noah, took great care of us throughout our visit and Chef Giorgio and his team prepared what I can easily describe as a perfect, professionally-presented meal for us. â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Absolutely wonderful food, experience and service!! The quality flavor of the food is indescribable. We will be back!! Thank you

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: I absolutely loved this place. The food was delicious and it was a great experience. The food and drinks were pricey, but we enjoyed paying for excellent food and a wonderful experience. Would absolutely go again.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: PepeNero is one of our favorite restaurants in town! The food and ambiance are always top notch and we enjoy every second weâ€™re there! Weâ€™ve been lucky to have Noah as our waiter the past 2 times. Heâ€™s very knowledgeable about everything on â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Me and my wife came here and had an amazing experience. We sat outside in the large outdoor seating area. They allowed our puppers which we really appreciated. The staff was friendly and helpful. For an appetizer we split the crab croquette â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Went in for the first time with high expectations. We've heard from many people that Pepenero was the place to go for dinner.  My expectations werent high enough. â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Our waiter was superb very knowledgeable about the food and wine menu, which added to our meal experience. The food and wine were very tasty and of great quality. I would have given a five star review but I feel like the prices were a â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: What a lovely experience! Definitely a great place to celebrate something special (like a birthday ðŸ¥³ ðŸ˜œ) Tasty food and a long selection of drinks.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Always a fantastic experience! The one place we always come back to in Traverse City.  The service is outstanding the food is incredible.  Always save room for dessert!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: PepeNero is such a delight and joy to dine at. The staff are so kind & friendly, with the head chef making rounds to greet those dining. The food is off the charts amazing with such a creative and diverse menu - you absolutely cannot go â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Very beautiful ambiance. Ordered fig & beet salad as a starter. It was beautifully presented but lacked in dressing and flavor. I ordered Casarecce as my entree. This was flavorful with home made pasta, rock shrimp and huge prawn. Then our â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Incredibly warm staff and great atmosphere. When the servers make recommendations you absolutely should listen, they won't steer you wrong. â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Top 10 dining experience of my entire life and I've dined in many of the best restaurants all around the world. THIS IS NEXT LEVEL. like nothing else in northern Michigan. Get the Beef Tar Tar. And the seafood Linguine.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: One of the best meals I've ever had. Our server, Kyle, was also fantastic. Would not hesitate to come here again. I had the Fillet Mignon and Polenta. Wow!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Pepenero never fails to disappoint. This time with truffles! The atmosphere of Pepenero is one of my favorites in Traverse City, the staff is so personable and friendly, they make you feel like family. And the food is always incredible. We were lucky enough to snag some meals while they had truffles, and it was delightful.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Great experience and excellent place to go for a birthday. Wife had a fantastic fillet and I enjoyed some handmade pasta. Staff was very friendly and knowledgable. Purple Heart cocktail was so good I could have drank a lot more.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Wow. You really have to try this place! The service from David was outstanding. He knew the menu well, made great suggestions, was kind and very attentive. The ambiance was so beautiful. The food!!! Every bite was a amazing!! The crab â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: This was the best dining experience I've had since I returned from vacation in California. Food was amazing. Staff was attentive and informative. Thank you so much for making my fiance's 25th birthday amazing. I'll definitely be back for more! ðŸ¤¤ðŸ¤¤ðŸ¤¤

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Came here for our 5th wedding anniversary - food was amazing! We received extra truffles compliments of the chef for our anniversary. Get the Focaccia and Balsamic, you won't regret it. Pasta and dessert were delicious, and had some of the â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Another great one in TC. David was our waiter. He was very knowledgeable about all the wines on the menu and had good conversation. The linguine seafood bowl was great along with the Cannelloni. Desert were art with flavor. Glad we could stop in.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: First time here, very happy with the service, staff and pleasant environment. Was greeted with a traditional "buonasera". Our waiter was very attentive and polite, kindly going over the menu to give us more details. We had the full courses â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Always an amazing experience at Pepe Nero! The quality of both the food and the service is unbeatable, very little else in the area compares. Do yourself a favor and make a reservation asap.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Food and drinks were great.  Ambiance is amazing.  Service was excellent.  Special shout out to David for being present and funny when we needed him and being in the background when we were in conversation.    Canâ€™t wait to come back!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text:
Good service, average food

If I seasoned my food like this, after 1.5hrs of waiting for the appetizer, my â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Impeccable service and incredible food.  PepeNero is the place to go when you desire only the best.  Keep up the great work.  Your dedication is unmatched.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: We enjoy dinner from the Restaurant Week menu  and it was beyond amazing.  The bartenders were friendly,  informative,  and great at what they do!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: An incredible dining experience. From start to finish, one of the best  meals ever. The staff was attentive and knowledgeable. The Chef is amazing. The food is PERFECTION. They pour top flight liquor and have an expansive wine and cocktail â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Off the main drag. Wonâ€™t comment on the food, but will tell you that from the moment we walked in they were not friendly. Didnâ€™t have reservations and were totally fine if they didnâ€™t have availability. They were rude as hell and told us â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: I wish I could give PepeNero a good review as this used to be one of my favorite restaurants in TC. However, our group had a terrible customer service experience couple weeks ago by their head hostess (not sure of her name, she was on the â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Our waiter David enchanted us into ordering one of the best meals we had in years. So grateful for the care   we received.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text:
This was my 4th time in Traverse City and my to go restaurant will always be Pepe Nero BallarÃ² which i believe to be the best chef-owned restaurant in town.
So many things i would like to point out: â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: This place is amazing in their menu selection, execution, and service. If you're debating going here or Trattoria Stella's just go here - every time. We went there the other night and were pretty disappointed. We discovered Trattoria Stella's owners are from Traverse City and PepeNero's are from Sicily. It makes sense now .

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: My husband and I had the most amazing meal at PepeNero. We had a great bottle of Syrah, a burrata appetizer, the pappardelle, and the branzino. Every single thing was fantastic. The ambience was beautiful and it was the perfect spot to celebrate our anniversary. We will be back the next time we're in town!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: One of the best dining experiences! The food is AMAZING!!! The service was impeccable. The ambience is great.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Nice meal, atmosphere and service. Told Brad what I was looking for and his suggestions were spot on!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Food, atmosphere and service are wonderful. Pricing is worth it and not insane. Highly recommend! Don't waste your space on the rolls though :)

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Wonderful and different food, cheerful and attentive wait staff,and interesting story behind the building and complex make this a great dining experience. â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: An excellent dining experience. All the staff was very attentive.  The owner stopped by to check in on us. Our food was prepared perfectly and was delicious. The atmosphere of the restaurant was both old world and yet modern.  We will definitely be back!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Wonderful experience. Our 1st visit will not be our last. Great and attentive waitstaff. The chef was checking with guests throughout our time here.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Just happened upon this exquisite restaurant! Delicious entree's! Very friendly staff! Love it! Great for quiet, personal, intimate dinner.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Fantastic food, great selection of wines and a wonderful atmosphere!! Don't look at the prices...just enjoy a night out with friends, family, and or significant other!!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: This is one of our favorite Traverse City date night spots. The decor is romantic, intimate, and classy. The specialty is Sicilian food, but make no mistakeâ€¦every dish is spectacular. Their filet is the best in town. Additionally, their â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Absolutely delicious food and great customer service. This is a must-try in Traverse City. â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Pepe Nero is one of the number one restaurants in Traverse City for fine dining. We go there at least once a month for the service, ambience, wine selection, and authentic Sicilian cuisine. I am Sicilian and have been to Sicilyâ€™s several â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: The Angus steak was well worth the price. We also enjoyed the butternut squash soup and the Purple Heart cocktails. The Brazzino was was also tasty. The ambiance was great and the service was top notch. Chris took such good care of us and made some excellent recommendations. We will certainly be back!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Authentic Italian cuisine. Very good products that are combined with knowledge and taste. We had 3 different entries and three different desserts, everything was really amazing and we are very very picky on Italian and European food. The â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Just came back awesome! (Wonderful late dinner. The squash soup was amazing. Also had the scallops. Cooked just right!)

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Very rude and unaccomodating staff. They would rather turn away customers than make a simple accommodation to add a chair for an additional child to join dinner in their outdoor dining space. Do not waste your time or money at this restaurant.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Always enjoyable! Excellent service by Noah. Loved Georgio stopping by as well. Thanks for a memorable evening!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: The location was nice. The ambiance was very inviting for our occasion. We were a tad late for our reservations but they still accommodated is upon arrival. The mushroom soup was EXCELLENT! The romaine salad was definitely a tongue teaser â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Just go. It's insanely excellent and you'd be crazy to skip it. The owner is wonderful and took time to talk to us about not just our food, but his family in Italy and ours. We'll be back every time we in the area.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Just finished an amazing dinner at PepeNero for my husband's 40th birthday. Chris was our server and was so knowledgeable,  friendly  and personable. The entire experience was a joy. So many special touches to celebrate my husband's special â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text:
One of the best meals I've ever had. Thought I should open with that.

Review Text: Amazing! Fantastic wine and drinks selection. Authentic Italian cuisine that was delightful. Noah was an amazing server who was great to talk to and made worthwhile suggestions. He was very attentive to our table and even though it was busy â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text:

This is our first dining experience and it by far exceeded our expectations. â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Absolutely outstanding. A must stop when visiting traverse city. The Tiramisu is a must have!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Excellent food and excellent service. Very romantic atmosphere. Definitely need a reservation.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Upscale dining inside the former chapel of the Asylum. Menu was limited but the available options were enough to satisfy even the pickiest of tastebuds. Staff was friendly and knowledgeable. In light of the times, it was a great experience and highly recommend stopping for lunch or dinner.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Server Brad was amazing, very helpful with the menus. Amazing wine selection, hundreds of bottles to choose from.  Food was over the top! Filet was best I have had in a while.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Wonderful atmosphere, very friendly & the food is outstanding.  Expensive but well worth the treat.  Appreciate the owner coming out to get our feedback, when that happens, you know they wanna make it right.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: FANTASTIC service and wine menu. Can't thank you all enough for making our anniversary so special. Brad is the best! Can he just be my waiter every time I go out?

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Only reason I'm giving this 4 stars and not 5 is because of how they handled their reservations. I was not in the least bit impressed by that or the attitude of the host. We had reservations for 930p and apparently when you make a â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text:
So,
I said:
Hey Georgio, thank you for dinner. It was unbelievably wonderful. â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Outstanding food, outdoor seating appropriately spaced apart. All staff friendly and masked.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Oh my gosh how amazing! And they were very serious about making sure our health and safety were a priority (as well as their own). The ravioli was the best we have ever had!! And the tre chocolati dessert was fabulous! Compliments to the owners wife for her creation!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Wonderful restaurant, our waitstaff was amazing, knowable, friendly and good at interaction with us. Food was great. Wine choices excellent.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Wow is all I can say.  We went to PepeNero based on recommendations from 2 people in our party over the weekend, they had hyped it up quite a bit and PepeNero exceeded all of our (high) expectations.  Everything I ordered (I cannot remember â€¦

Review Text: Wonderfully attentive to their guests.  Widely knowledgab staff.  Fabulous bar.  Great service is hard to find except here!  And the food...oh the food...its marvelous.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: The Spiedini was awesome. Great service.  Ii would have preferred the waitstaff had worn masks

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Another great dining choice in TC. Have never had a bad night at Pepe Nero. Service is always excellent. Food choices are many and should keep everyone happy. Great wine selection. And I love that the chef owner visits each table during the evening.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: We had an incredible dinner at PepeNero! Our server Dorin was knowledgeable on the menu and very personable, which made our experience one to remember. The food and cocktails are worth every penny. Every server was wearing masks and taking precautions during COVID-19. We will definitely be back!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text:
This is a unique experience.....

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Excellent food and service! Our server was exceptional! Thank you Noah for taking care of us!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: The food was outstanding and the atmosphere was great and the service was great

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: The food was absolutely amazing. The service was also great! I recommend sitting outside- the atmosphere is lovely.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: We checked out Happy Hour at 3:30 on a quiet Thursday. Nice selection of beverages (about $5) & 4 selections of small appetizers for $6. Everything was delicious! We tried the arancini, gnocchi (on regular app menu, so more $), & special app, croquettes! All was excellent! We will go back for dinner!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Second time here.  Came back to TC, primarily to eat here, and Aragon, did not disappoint.  Meal and service were top drawer/. You can tell these people love food.  Tip, the Tiramisu looked like nothing I have ever seen before, but was every bit as delicious, and more, as any I have ever eaten.  Job well done!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Awesome service, the food was so good and authentic.  Interesting atmosphere as well.  I was pleasantly surprised.  They have a great margarita. I canâ€™t wait to go back next time Iâ€™m in Traverse City.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Horrible experience, they made my date, and I wait in the cold for a table. The prices are absurd for what is served. I ordered the pork tenderloin, when it arrived at the table, it was bland, and had a ratio of 75% fat, to 25% meat. I am disappointed, and will never return here.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Excellent overall experience. Our waitress, Kathleen, was knowledgeable, professional and friendly. Our meals were exceptionally constructed while the cocktail was crafted with great skill.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: I wanted so bad to enjoy this experience...But couldn't. We waited over an hour for our food, and to be honest, it wasn't worth the wait. Both our entrees were from the pasta section. We were starving by the time it came and decide not to â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Wonderful experience even in times of COVID-19! The restaurant exceeded our expectations for the high quality of food, service, and presentation. Amazing attention for details and interesting menu made our dinner the highlight of our trip in Traverse City!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: There was absolutely nothing I can say bad about this place. Outstanding authentic Italian food, unbeatable service, and fantastic experience. The mushroom ravioli with pork sauce was delicious but everyone in our party loved their food. We â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Service was great. The wine list is extensive and very affordable. We ordered a seafood board which was delicious. I had the Gorgonzola pasta which was the best I've ever had. The Gorgonzola is mixed with pears and it is an interesting and tasty combination. My husband got the paparadelle but he didn't think it was saucy enough.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Fantastic meal, as always. My husband and I enjoyed our anniversary dinner immensely!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Best Italian in Traverse City.  Profoundly better than the once excellent Stellas.  New favorite.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: The food and service was outstanding. Highly recommend.

Review Text: Great Italian fine dining. Our server was outstanding, really fantastic service.  Interesting menu, beautiful atmosphere.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Food, staff and atmosphere is out of this world. If youâ€™re looking for an authentic Italian experience. Pepe Nero is the place.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: I canâ€™t say enough good things about this place! My husband and I visited PepeNero to celebrate his 25th birthday and we were treated with such class from the time we walked in from the time we left. â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Terrible experience. We went in to enjoy a cocktail before a wedding reception that started upstairs. What a stuck up atmosphere! The food was little, expensive and overrated! Very snobby owner and wait staff! Definitely seems like they are â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Just had drinks at the wine bar during happy hour. Great atmosphere and staff is very friendly and efficient. We will return for drinks and appetizers. The food menu looks a little too phoofy   for us. I'm sure many will like it.

Review Text: An absolute gem of a restaurant with exceptional cuisine, spectacular atmosphere of the old insane asylum and fantastic service of the chef Giorgio and desserts, courtesy of his wife, Monica.

Wonderful food, so reminiscent of a recent trip
to Naples. Knowledgeable and friendly service, an interesting wine list. A lovely experience that we didnâ€™t expect.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Solid 5/5.  Maybe not quite as good as Trattoria Stella but go to both yourself and make your own judgement.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Excellent food. Service is always top notch. If you are able to request Noah H. do it. Have been here multiple times and am never disappointed with the food. It is a pricier restaurant but it's worth it for the service you get.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Absolutely the finest Italian establishment in TC area! Amazing small plates, great wine, superb atmosphere, and the friendliest/most sincerely happy service Iâ€™ve seen in a long time. Clearly great management! Every bite was delicious! Weâ€™ll become frequent diners!

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Best fine dining in all of Traverse City. The other Italian place at the Village doesn't even come close. Don't miss the sea bass! And if you enjoy cocktails, the espresso martini is to die for.

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Celebrating our 35th wedding  anniversary and it couldn't have been better. From the atmosphere to the amazing food to the service this was a perfect night. Shout out to our server Noel for making the night so special for us.

Review Text: Service was great, however this place is NOT accommodating to food allergies (specifically dairy and gluten sensitivities.) The menu specifies that they are extremely sensitive to allergies as well as what we were told upon arrival (which â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Unreal- the food is phenomenal as are the drinks. We sat on the patio and could not have had a more lovely evening

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Thanks to Monica, the chef and the wonderful team at PepeNero, I had a fantastic evening there with a group of work colleagues from across the country. Karen and Eugene were the PERFECT servers for us â€” so very good at their jobs, and â€¦

Name: Pepenero
Review Text: Above par food, but a highly uncomfortable dining experience. Iâ€™m not sure if it was because I was young or dressed casually, but I was not made a priority and felt very judged instead of welcomed as a paying customer. For a higher-end â€¦

Review Text: It was an amazing meal tonight as my friends and I participated in Restaurant Week. Absolutely delicious! And the service was stellar as well.

Review Text: Excellent entrees.  We started with roasted brussel sprouts.   My bride had the scallops and I had the branzino. Both had excellent flavor.  We finished with tiramisu,  Spanish coffee their own mixture of coffee, dark chocolate with desorrano infused whipped cream.   Highly recommend this meal!

Review Text: I would like to put out a big thank you for the best experience I have ever had the food was really amazing our sever was the best I've ever had in any restaurant he was very Knowledgeable about everything on the menu i couldn't of asked for a better dinner
